headline.print_headline: Kentucky Warns Noah's Ark Theme Park Over Hiring Practices
headline.main: Kentucky Warns Noah's Ark Theme Park Over Hiring Practices

lead_paragraph: The developer of a Noah's Ark-based theme park in Kentucky said on Wednesday he would fight for his religious rights after state officials warned he could lose millions in potential tax credits if he hires only people who believe in the biblical flood.
